title: Kate Hudson
description:
Actress and entrepreneur Kate Hudson feels insecure about being Conan O’Brien’s friend.

Kate sits down with Conan to talk about the key to being a good salesperson, rediscovering the music of the 90s through her kids, and family lessons learned from iconic parents Goldie Hawn and Kurt Russell. Plus, Conan shares an urgent news update with his team.

Got a question for Conan? Call our voicemail: (323) 451-2821.

For Conan videos, tour dates and more visit TeamCoco.com.
author: conaf@teamcoco.com (Team Coco & Earwolf)
